alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Ave Maria to near Hendry Correctional. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Miles City, Sunniland, Bunker Hill and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until these storms pass. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.
